data.eml:eml: Darwin's legacy to rove beetles (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae): A new genus and a new species, including materials collected on the Beagle's voyage

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chatzimanolis, Stylianos (2014): Darwin's legacy to rove beetles (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae): A new genus and a new species, including materials collected on the Beagle's voyage. ZooKeys 379: 29-41, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.379.6624, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.379.6624
